definition: wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn
to expel/to urge on/to drive/to run quickly
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Constitutional Affairs, Ford F150 2004 Super four-wheel drive.
sentences.chinese: 政制事務局2004年福特F150超級四輪驅動。

sentences.english: An Audi four-wheel drive unit could also be installed, as it is on the Continental .
sentences.chinese: 奧迪四輪驅動裝置也可以安裝，因爲它是在大陸。

sentences.english: In this configuration, the performance of C5 Airscape is close to that of a four-wheel drive.
sentences.chinese: 在這種配置中，碳五鳥瞰性能接近，一輛四輪驅動。
的縮寫，意爲“四輪驅動的休閒運動車”。

sentences.english: A convertible and a 4-wheel drive are also in the final design stage.
sentences.chinese: 敞篷車和四輪驅動車也已經進入設計的最後階段。

sentences.english: The drawings reveal Ferrari is working on an all - wheel drive hybrid system.
sentences.chinese: 圖紙透露法拉利是工作的全時四輪驅動混合動力系統。

sentences.english: Pick up from your hotel by 4WD Car.
sentences.chinese: 拿起您的酒店，四輪驅動車。

sentences.english: Front-wheel drive will be standard but all-wheel drive should be optional.
sentences.chinese: 標準搭配前輪驅動，但可額外自選四輪驅動。

sentences.english: But motors could be fitted to the front wheels as well to provide four-wheel drive.
sentences.chinese: 但是也可以通過在前輪上安裝電動機來實現四輪驅動。

sentences.english: AWD more than adequate for everyday situations and light off- roading .
sentences.chinese: 全時四輪驅動系統有足夠的日常情況和輕型越野。

sentences.english: The old truck doesn’t offer four-wheel drive and this is what enforced him to buy a new one.
sentences.chinese: 舊車不能四輪驅動，這迫使他花錢買新車。

sentences.english: Quadra Trac I delivers full-time four-wheel drive without any switches or levers to pull.
sentences.chinese: 沒有任何鎖閉裝置的全時四輪驅動拉。

sentences.english: The Metropolis also benefits from a four-wheel drive mode and a Hydractive suspension.
sentences.chinese: 都市裏也有利於從一輛四輪驅動模式，並水面懸浮。

sentences.english: A convertible and a 4-wheel drive areals oin the final design stage.
sentences.chinese: 敞篷車和四輪驅動車也已經進入設計的最後階段。

sentences.english: He put the jeep in four-wheel drive and splashed up the slope.
sentences.chinese: 他將吉普車切換爲四輪驅動模式後涉水爬上了坡。
亨利戲稱它爲“四輪驅動腳踏車。”
